actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of March 12, 1914, relating to Alaskan railroads, to provide for relocation, travel, and transportation expenses for the General Manager of the Alaskan Railroad.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the President to fix relocation, travel, and transportation expenses for the General Manager of the Alaska Railroad. Stipulates that this Act shall apply to the present General Manager with respect to such expenses whether they were incurred before or after the enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of March 12, 1914, relating to Alaskan railroads, to provide for relocation, travel, and transportation expenses for the General Manager of the Alaskan Railroad.
